title: UAE invests $35bn to develop Ras Al Hekma City in Egypt
description: Egypt and the United Arab Emirates (UAE) signed a real estate investment deal on Friday, granting Abu Dhabi Developmental Holding Company (ADQ) the rights to develop the Ras Al Hekma project for $24bn. The deal aims to transform the area into a thriving destination, with an additional $11bn in deposits to be used for investments […]

title: Egypt to receive $35bn down payment for Ras Al Hekma deal within 2 months
description: Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly announced that Egypt will receive $35bn as a down payment for the Ras Al Hekma development deal. The first payment of $15bn will be received within two months, followed by another $20bn. The Prime Minister explained that the first payment of the deal includes $10bn in direct liquidity from abroad, in […]
